job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtbest company to work for in the triangle hands downltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtthis jobot job is hosted by craig rosecransltbrgtltbrgtare you a fit easy apply now by clicking the apply button and sending us your resumeltbrgtltbrgtsalary per yearltbrgtltbrgtltstronggta bit about usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjobot is seeking a machine learning engineer who will be part of a team that leads the way in bringing artificial intelligence and machine learning into the very processes and systems that impact how customers are served this is an exciting opportunity to make an impact with by leveraging ai and ml techniques to create production level systems through application of machine learning modelsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwhy join usltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtwe are the fastest growing startup in nc ampamp are known for our incredibly tight knit culture we love what we do ampamp believe in empowering our people to be as creative and entrepreneurial as humanly possible we are looking for a senior machine learning engineer to join our talented team of engineers and scientistsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjob detailsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt designing and developing ml modelsltligtltligt working individually and part of a team to improve currently models and implement new techniquesltligtltligt offer technical recommendations on improvements across processesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtqualificationsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt masters or phd in computer science or similar disciplineltligtltligt years commercial experienceltligtltligt strong experience within machine learningltligtltligt experience in at least of the following deep learning computer vision nlpltligtltligt programming python javaltbrgtltligtltulgtinterested in hearing more easy apply now by clicking the apply buttonltbrgtltbrgt
